issue.title: [BUG] Print statements not appearing in Google Colab
issue.body:
Printing doesn't work from the Julia side in Google colab. This is fixable with a redirect of `stdout` - I think this can be automatically fixed with this: https://github.com/JuliaPy/pyjulia/issues/498.

There's a comment in the redirection function that says ```Invoking `redirect_output_streams()` in terminal IPython terminates the whole Python process```, so the library should be careful about having this automatically configured.

nodes.body: Manually fixed in the jupyter notebook. For a general fix this should be automatically done in PyJulia.
